\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*: \w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w hot|strong="H2527"\w*. \w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w while|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* \w yet|strong="H3808"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w by|strong="H3427"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* \w shut|strong="H1479"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* barred: \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w set|strong="H5975"\w* watchmen \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w by|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* courses, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* mall \w over|strong="H5704"\w* \w against|strong="H5048"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.
